fields_of_interest: Competition, Consumers, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: European transport policy, Digital Single Market development, transport decarbonisation, platform economy, sharing economy
organisation_name: Mobility as a Service Alliance (MaaS Alliance)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: The Mobility as a Service (MaaS) Alliance is a public-private partnership creating the foundations for a common approach to MaaS, unlocking the economies of scale needed for successful implementation and take-up of MaaS in Europe and beyond. The main goal is to facilitate a single, open market and full deployment of MaaS services.
